#include<iostream>

using namespace std;

int main()
{
	long int t,e,o,ans;
	
	double reqd_ratio=(double)2/3,e_upon_o=0;
	
	scanf("%ld",&t);
	
	while(t--)
	 {
	 	scanf("%ld %ld",&e,&o);
	 	
	 	if( (e+o)%5==0 )
	 	 {
	 	 	e_upon_o=(double)e/o;
	 	 	
	 	 	if( e_upon_o==reqd_ratio )
	 	 	 {
	 	 	 	printf("0\n");
	 	 	 }
	 	 	else if( e_upon_o>reqd_ratio )
			 {
			 	ans=e-2*( (e+o)/5 );
			 	
			 	printf("%ld\n",ans);
			 }
			else if( e_upon_o<reqd_ratio )
			 {
			 	ans=o-3*( (e+o)/5 );
			 	
			 	printf("%ld\n",ans);
			 }
	 	 }
	 	else
		 {
		 	printf("-1\n");
		 } 
	 	
	 }
	 
	return 0; 
}
